sentence.text: We have previously identified a novel zinc finger protein, glial cell line-derived neurotrophic factor-inducible zinc finger protein 1 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), whose expression was induced in the human neuroblastoma cell line TGW expressing regulation of cell adhesion by neural crest cell migration stimulation and was also detected in mouse metanephric kidney.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We also evaluated negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression in various kidney diseases including membranous nephropathy, minimal change nephrotic syndrome with or without acute kidney injury, immunoglobulin A nephropathy, diabetic nephropathy, acute tubular necrosis, and antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody-related glomerulonephritis.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In addition, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression was undetectable or very low in most cases of renal cell carcinomas and Wilms tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
